Title: Hidden Away
Actors: GermÃ¡n Alcarazu, Adil Koukouh, Joseba Ugalde, Moussa Echarif
Plot: Ibrahim, a 14-year-old Moroccan boy, walks down a road in the outskirts of a big city alone and disoriented. Recently informed that he will be deported in two days, he packed his belongings and ran away. He is now alone with no place to go.
